name: ChronoPlatformer Technical Demo
description:
ChronoPlatformer (working name) is a puzzle platformer with a Groundhog's Day style twist. The day is destined to repeat itself over and over until you accomplish a specific task.

There are chests around the level with challenges you must face to retrieve the items from them.  You might not be able to accomplish everything in a given day, such is the way of life. However, there is a ChronoBox on the starting platform which does not seem to follow the rules of life. While everything else goes back to its original state when you loop back to the beginning of the day, the ChronoBox stays the way you left it. 

To win, try and collect all of the items in the ChronoBox

Controls:

  • A/D - move left/right
  • Space - Jump/Double Jump
  • E - Open chests
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack
  • T - Time warp to beginning of day
  • Alt-F4 - Exit game
